column2: # Import the data, convert everything to numeric, and keep just the variables we'll need
select(year, State, state_abbr, std3_read = std3_read_std1_all, std5_read = std5_read_std2_all, std3_math  = std3_subtract_all, std5_math = std5_divis_all) %>%
# Get 2014 NSDP and merge in with ASER data
nsdp <- read_excel(file.path(nsdp_path, "Indian state per capita NSDP 2014.xlsx"))
